Thomas Nolte About Portfolio

C15CO

For my Senior Design class we developed and fabricated an Autonomus Moblie Robot(AMR) for Cisco Systems Work Place Resources(WPR). This robot uses lidar and stereo vision to patrol around Cisco's cafateria towing a dirty dish cart as a part of Cisco's goal to increase the use of reusables.
C15 operating in building 7 at Cisco
We atarted by visting Cisco's building and obtaining measurements and
